details.title: Corrections to “Comparison of Sub-Millimeter-Wave Scattering-Parameter Calibrations With Imperfect Electrical Ports” [Jan 12 144-152]
details.abstract: On page 145 of the above-named article [ibid., vol. 2, no. 1, pp. 144-152, Jan. 2012], Table I was printed incorrectly, and the column headings were left out. The corrected table is printed here.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
